created_by: Sander Wiebing, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
name: Netsh Program Allowed with Suspcious Location
description: Detects Netsh commands that allows a suspcious application location on Windows Firewall
query: (((process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Ll][Ll][Oo][Ww][Ee][Dd][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Vv][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ww][Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\=[Aa][Ll][Ll][Oo][Ww].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\=.*/)) AND (process.command_line:(/.*%[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]%.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\$[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee]\.[Bb][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Vv][Oo][Ll][Uu][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Tt][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/) OR process.command_line:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Bb][Uu][Gg]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ff][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Hh][Ee][Ll][Pp]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ss][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/ OR /%[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]%\\.*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*add* AND process.command_line:*allowedprogram*) OR (process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*advfirewall* AND process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*add* AND process.command_line:*rule* AND process.command_line:*action\=allow* AND process.command_line:*program\=*)) AND (process.command_line:(*%TEMP%* OR *\:\\RECYCLER\\* OR *C\:\\$Recycle.bin\\* OR *\:\\SystemVolumeInformation\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Default\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet\ Files\\Content.Outlook\\* OR *\\Local\ Settings\\Temporary\ Internet\ Files\\*) OR process.command_line:(C\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\debug\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\fonts\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\help\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\drivers\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\addins\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\cursors\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\system32\\tasks\\* OR %Public%\\*)))`
